title: New basement rental
posting_body: We have a new basement apartment for rent in a really nice neighborhood in lawrenceville.
It is approx 1450 sq ft. Big full kitchen, new appliances, walk in pantry and lots of space for kitchen table etc.
it has a family room and living room with 2 bedrooms.
Spacious and light and very clean.
We are looking to rent to tenants who aren’t  easily bothered by noise, as we have 4 small children living above you.
We are also looking for quiet-ish tenants because we have small children that sleep early and need quiet.
Our requirements are to be very very clean and
Give me a call or text for more details.
